meanings.definition: A chemical compound derived from butane.

meanings.sent2: Isobutyls are often found in cleaning products.
meanings.sent3: The isobutyls in the beaker decided to throw a party.

meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of isobutyls filled the room.

meanings.definition: The isobutyl group, a branched-chain alkyl group.
meanings.sent1: The chemist studied the structure of the isobutyls.
meanings.sent2: Isobutyls can be found in many organic compounds.
meanings.sent3: The isobutyls in the molecule were feeling rebellious.

meanings.definition: Isobutyls are commonly used as solvents in various industries.
